Description: Propolis is a worker-placement, engine-building, area-control, and tableau-building game. Players take on the role of medieval bee colonies and take turns deploying bees to collect pollen, fortify their positions, and construct their hives to appease their queen and become the most glorious.

Try the new "tactical, heroic, cinematic fantasy RPG" in this convention adventure from MCDM. Bring a miniature - this will very much be played on a battle map, folks!
Recommend for experienced tabletop roleplaying players, but I'm more than happy to teach.

In Space Base, players assume the roles of Commodores of a small fleet of ships. Ships begin docked at their stations and are then deployed to sectors as new ships are commissioned under your command.

Join a pirate crew of misfits out for danger and wonder on the Great Sea!  Play as a haunted captain possessed by a vengeful ghosts, a bound djinni trapped within a magic book, a dark sea-sorcerer who made a deal with a demon, or a mysterious navigator who stole the heart of the ocean.

Event Name: Fathoms Beyond - a Level 3 Daggerheart One-Shot
Description:
A prominent noble from your town named Alfred Izul has not returned from a trade mission to the village of Blackjaw Harbor. Your burgomaster requests you find him and bring him home.

A tale of mystery, cults, and what lies beyond.

Terraforming Mars: The Dice Game takes the gameplay from Terraforming Mars and simplifies it while still providing a satisfying number of choices without requiring prior knowledge of all the cards. This event is open to beginners, and will include time for teaching.

Always wanted to try Twilight Imperium (4th Edition)? Learn the rules, explore factions, and get battle-ready in this fast-paced intro session. No experience needed—just your ambition to conquer the galaxy!

Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution. We will begin with rules teach (45 min). Your spot will be held for 10 min past starting time. After that it is 1st come 1st served, or we start with a lower player count out of respect for others' time.

Consec-ya! is the simple card game of “Consec-ya”tive numbers. Roll the die, draw a card, make a trade, and pass the die! Be on the lookout for rotatable and wild cards! Make clever but bold trades! Hurry before the first draw pile runs out! Will having the longest Consec-ya! be enough to win?

Propolis is a worker-placement, engine-building, area-control, and tableau-building game. Players take on the role of medieval bee colonies and take turns deploying bees to collect pollen, fortify their positions, and construct their hives to appease their queen and become the most glorious.

In Kingsburg, players are Lords sent from the King to administer frontier territories.

The game takes place over five years, a total of 20 turns. In every year, there are 3 production seasons for collecting resources, building structures, and training troops

Venture into a cavernous megadungeon, Loidheim! A river starts close to the top of the caves, and the Delving Company Boss has provisioned some canoes to chart out the river and go as deep as you can go. System: D&D 2014 rules at level 2. Pregenerated characters will be available, or make your own.

Stefan Feld card game! Players receive a 36-card deck, choosing 10 different ceremonies out of a possible 25, so each game is different. Draw cards, start ceremonies, or play to ceremonies to score points and clear your deck. Pay attention to ceremonies in front of you as they give you abilties!
Full rules explanation followed by guided play. Designed for people who have always wanted to learn Terraforming Mars, but may have found it a little intimidating.

Event Name: Speed Puzzle - Solo (Sponsored by Cobble Hill Puzzles)
Description:
Please read all details carefully before registering.

Date: January 23th
Check-in Time: 11:45 AM
Start Time: 12:00 PM sharp

Puzzle Size: approx. 300 pieces
Image: Revealed when the competition begins!

SOLO MODE ONLY - We are working to add a group puzzle tournament.
A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. A few weeks ago, a massive alien starship emerged from deep space and crashed into the planet Akiton.
Roland Winter is being held hostage and you're tasked with getting him back, preferably alive and in one piece. A GAMMA WORLD 7th Edition adventure. Pregenerated characters will be provided.

Event Name: "Who The Devil Are You?" a game by Monte Cook
Description: In most RPGs, the GM provides the story, setting, and context to the players and the players create characters to fit that world. But what if we turned all that upside down? In this game, the process of making the characters also builds the world the adventure. Creation takes <30 min.
New to Dice + Diversions? First time using Tabletop.Events? Or just want a quick lay of the land and a chance to meet one of the event organizers? We’ve got you covered.

A super-hero experience utilizing the fast-paced "One-Punch System" in a dystopian world where the "heroes" have taken over the worlds governments and normal people (Homo Sapiens) are second-class citizens. Which side are you on? New TTRPG - will be teaching system.

Discover this really clever twist on trick-taking! Each card in your hand is a cat in a Schrödinger-type experiment; you know the number from the start, but you determine the color when you play the card (ie, when you “open the box and observe it”). Be careful not to create a paradox!
Sling spells, bust your friends, and battle for moon sapphires in this suited, competitive card game for wizards.

Event Name: Pirate Borg: Trapped in the Tropics
Description: Ahoy, scallywags! Dive into shark-infested seas & brave a jungle swarming with undead fiends & desperate rogues! In this wild Pirate Borg adventure, danger lurks at every turn. Will ye emerge as legends or join the crew of the damned? Adventure be callin’, so ready yer swords & set sail for glory!

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

Draft dice and use the tools-of-the-trade in Sagrada to carefully construct your stained glass window masterpiece.

Each player builds a stained glass window by building up a grid of dice on their player board. Each board has some restrictions on which color or shade (value) of die can be placed

Light game- build a kingdom and collect the most points. 
Plays best with 2 or 4 players. 
Will be taught game basics and some strategy.

Race around the world facing the macabre, the vicious and the unspeakable in order to stop the Great Old One from awakening! Dive into this classic and widely-beloved co-op game of Lovecraftian horror. Newcomers welcome! We will play the base game, using the Resource and Focus rules.

Event Name: D&D 5e - Beginner Friendly - Scarecrow and Mrs. King
Description: Mrs. King's crops just aren't growing like they use to and her fields seem to be infested with.......something.  Can you help exterminate her problems?  New players welcome and pre-gens will be provided.
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.

Event Name: The Monty Python Role Playing Game
Description: A hearty congratulations for having registered to receive instruction in English History via Monty Python’s Cocurricular Mediaeval Reenactment Programme. This Programme is in no way silly or irreverent and can absolutely be taken completely seriously.

Galactic Cruise is a thinky (but not burnout your brain), worker placement game where players are competing to build and launch cruise ships into space. This event is open to beginners, and will include time for teaching.

ENTHRONE is a unique, abstract deduction strategy game for two players. You are the power behind the power. You are the silent hand and one of these unwitting 8 pawns will be your key to securing complete dominion. But your rival hides their own machinations to challenge you.

Command the Stars! New to Twilight Imperium 4th Edition? Learn the rules, explore factions, and get battle-ready in this fast-paced intro session. No experience needed—just your ambition to conquer the galaxy!

Join the Murder Mavens as they investigate a suspicious drowning in cozy Brindlewood Bay. Interview suspects, gather strange clues, and build your own solution in this collaborative, murder-mystery one-shot.

In 1993 the world ended not with a bang, but with an exhalation of a Crypt Door. You take on the role of magical practitioners fighting against cryptids and malevolent spirits to reclaim the Dead Spaces of the world. Crowdfunding this February on Kickstarter.

Event Name: Speed Puzzle - Group (Sponsored by Cobble Hill Puzzles)
Description:
This year we add Speed Puzzle - Group Tournament. A max of 4 people per team. A team MUST have at least 2 people. No teammate swaps after puzzle has started.
ONLY one person from team needs to register but everyone is required to have a D+D badge.

DND 5e rules light, where the players play Wizard/Sorcerer hybrids, which not need to prepare spells, and can modify them with meta-magic.  There will be side based initiative, full spell recovery is one hour, 4th level pregen characters provided. It will be combat light, politics heavy.
New to Dice + Diversions? First time using Tabletop.Events? Or just want a quick lay of the land and a chance to meet one of the event organizers? We’ve got you covered.
Collect magic pearls as they flow downriver in this kinetic worker placement game

The most untamed of the Moonshaes, residents on Moray are accustomed to defending themselves. Recently something has stirred the dark forces that threaten the families of this strategically vital location. Who will answer their call for aid? A 4-hr Adventurers League adventure for Tier 1 (lvl 1-4).

Event Name: SETI + Space Agencies: Learn to Play
Description: Search for signs of alien life by launching probes and analyzing distant signals. We will begin with rules teach (45 min). Your spot will be held for 10 min past starting time. After that it is 1st come 1st served, or we start with a lower player count out of respect for others' time.

There’s been a murder, and you and your friends are the most likely suspects. Enter Niles Noir, the professional detective. But when he starts pulling strings that were never meant to be touched, what secrets will come to light?

Come find out in this Knives Out-inspired one-shot.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

Event Name: The Invasion of Kragarog - a Level 3 Daggerheart Oneshot
Description: The time has come to prove yourself to King and Country. Your sovereign - King Hydronthadus VI of Ossuaria - has sent your strike team to instigate the invasion of Kragarog, Ossuaria's sworn enemy. Scout ahead of the main force and spare none in your path. Glory and riches for those who survive!
Sling spells, bust your friends, and battle for moon sapphires in this suited, competitive card game for wizards.
Produce the B side of an unfinished and legendary rock album.

Netrunner is a two-player asymmetric card game set in a dystopian cyberpunk future. Check out our booth for products, convention exclusive promos, and merch!

NOTE: This event lists a specific start time, but walkups at all vendor hours are encouraged and welcome!

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.
Full rules explanation followed by guided play. Designed for people who have always wanted to learn Terraforming Mars, but may have found it a little intimidating.

Castle Combo is a tableau-building game that combines simplicity with deep, engaging gameplay, offering highly satisfying experiences.

Each player will spend coins to draft 9 cards from 2 open markets on the table (the lower and upper city), creating along the game a 3x3 square of people interactin
Build your deck and hurry into the dragons lair to steal the treasures. Just be sure to get above ground (or better yet , out of the castle) before the dragon catches up!

Event Name: Daggerheart: A Beast Feast 1st level oneshot
Description:
The village of Elmore has been safe from dangerous monsters for decades. Now, that safety net is failing. It's up to a plucky band of newcomer adventurers to keep Elmore safe from a mysterious, hungry beast!

Expect vibes similar to Monster Hunter, Delicious in Dungeon, and light-hearted fantasy.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. When a nascent godling called the Newborn was birthed from the planet Aucturn in 324 AG, chunks of its planetary womb and embryonic fluids were cast across the Pact Worlds.
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.
Roland Winter is being held hostage and you're tasked with getting him back, preferably alive and in one piece. A GAMMA WORLD 7th Edition adventure. Pregenerated characters will be provided.
Produce the B side of an unfinished and legendary rock album.
Explorers race to be the first to reach the coveted Bear Mountain Campsite

Event Name: Estate: Raise the Realm - Learn to Play
Description: Learn to play Estate: Raise the Realm with the designers! In Estate: Raise the Realm, players take on the role of noble leaders rebuilding their Estates after the great war, competing to earn the most Victory Points by the fifth Era. Each leader commands unique abilities and an asymmetric tableau.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

The clever little game Code 777 combines the elements of a good, logical deduction game and Indian poker. Each player receives a rack for keeping three tiles drawn from a pool of tiles, which are seven different numbers in seven different colors (28 tiles in total); however, the rack is turned away

Blightfall is a dark fantasy TTRPG geared for tragic tales of mutated villagers trading their humanity for the power to defend their home.

Read a playtest review here: https://secretsundaysampler.com/2025/10/16/blightfall-doomed-heroes/

Event Name: Opening Ceremonies - Sponsored by The Op
Description: Kick off Dice + Diversions with The Op! Check out TACTA™, a clever and colorful card game of flipping and aligning shapes. Enjoy casual play, explore smart strategies, and take part in special giveaways throughout the event.

"The Whimsy Engine" is a roleplaying game of wonder, wit, and weirdness, set in a magical Gilded Age where style is strength, charm is currency, and narrative drives reality. The rules are simple but the plot can be as complicated and in-depth as you desire. New TTRPG - will be teaching system.

In Knarr, you are the leader of a band of Vikings that you send to new destinations. Manage the recruitment of your crew, and choose the best territories to explore. Depending on the destinations reached (for trading or influence) and the Vikings who accompany you, you can increase your reputation

A Pathfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 4th-level characters. Tensions are high following the Battle of Hellknight Hill, and while Cheliax hasn't taken any direct action, they've encouraged privateers to attack Andoran shipping.
4 players race to build the best zoo possible!

An unexplained radiation event, followed by a cryptic radio message, has sent a response team to the far-northern Norwegian island of Svalbard. The response team is elite. The best of the best.

But... are they prepared for the horrors they face? Horrors they cannot escape, even in death?
New to Dice + Diversions? First time using Tabletop.Events? Or just want a quick lay of the land and a chance to meet one of the event organizers? We’ve got you covered.

Werewolf is a social deduction game played in rounds with two phases: day and night. By day, players debate who is guilty; by night, special powers are used and the werewolves secretly choose a victim. Will you survive?

Event Name: The Rattling Roar, A Wildsea One-Shot
Description: This is an introduction to the Wildsea, a solarpunk game of verdant strangeness. Ship and Character Pre-Gens provided for this Beginner Wildsea One-Shot.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

Take the helm of the starship Tempest on a routine supply run to a remote asteroid Mining base, Ypsilon-14, where not all is as it seems.

Beginner friendly! All supplies/characters provided.

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.

Compete to be the best barista! Place your wager on how many drinks you think you can serve and then work together with the other baristas to try and achieve your goal to gain valuable experience points XP and win.

Event Name: "Who The Devil Are You?" a game by Monte Cook
Description: In most RPGs, the GM provides the story, setting, and context to the players and the players create characters to fit that world. But what if we turned all that upside down? In this game, the process of making the characters also builds the world the adventure.

In Knarr, you are the leader of a band of Vikings that you send to new destinations. Manage the recruitment of your crew, and choose the best territories to explore. Depending on the destinations reached (for trading or influence) and the Vikings who accompany you, you can increase your reputation

Gather forbidden occult knowledge and conduct horrifying experiments to carry on your father's macabre "science" for the benefit (?) of future generations! This app-driven Euro/Ameritrash hybrid is dripping with fun Gothic theme, but is also a well-designed, deeply satisfying worker-placement game.
Quick demonstration and competition

Step into a world where sports meet spellcasting! Magical Athlete is a delightful, fast-paced card game where magical competitors go head-to-head in enchanted athletic events. Play cards, trigger abilities, and outscore your opponents as you cheer your favorite athlete to victory.
This game is intended for first-time or novice DC20 players. I will start the session with an overview of the rules, and then we will dive into the adventure.
Apiary is a worker placement game by Stonemaier where you are in control of a hive of highly evolved space bees. Bees in space!!

During the medieval goings-on around Orléans, you must assemble a following of farmers, merchants, knights, monks, etc. to gain supremacy through trade, construction and science in medieval France.

In Orléans, you will recruit followers and put them to work to make use of their abilities. Farmers a

Werewolf is a social deduction game played in rounds with two phases: day and night. By day, players debate who is guilty; by night, special powers are used and the werewolves secretly choose a victim. Will you survive?

The Party Line is a social deduction game where you play as farm animals voting on fictional issues affecting your farm. Your goal is to stay loyal by matching your votes to the Farmer's vote. But beware there are multiple factions with their own unique win conditions.

Event Name: GMing 201 - Elevating Your GM Skills to the Next Level!
Description:
A fun & educational session to level-up your GMing! Topics: Performing voices for NPCs, Speeding up areas that often drag, and other tips to enhance your games!

Led by Ian O'Donnell, veteran GM, game author & speaker at DragonCon, Momocon, SFGE. Ian is also a Dialect Coach & Voice Actor himself!
Rescue and train dragons, rally heroes, and make a stand against the dragon poachers

Aperture is a quick board game where 2-4 players compete to shoot the best roll of film! Each new photo card you take determines how your previous shot is framed and gets scored. This creates a dynamic and ever-evolving composition. Navigate the board, make clever plays, and fulfill hidden objective

Event Name: Secrets Of Lords and Ladies (D&D 5th level, Edition 2024)
Description: In the old world of London, something old springs in the night. In the era of Victoria London, you are sent as detectives to find the secret and the one responsible. As something odd starts happening to the Lords and Ladies of London. Some go missing so murder in the night. Its on you to find out.
In Knarr, you are the leader of a band of Vikings that you send to new destinations. Manage the recruitment of your crew, and choose the best territories to explore.

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.
Learn and play Hot Streak, the hilarious mascot racing game from CMYK Games. Erin and Ryan from One Board Family will get you and your friends setup and bidding on these wacky racers.

Come join me at the table to play a highly flavorful cooperative, dice-chucking, boss battler: Townsfolk Tussle! Oozing in 1930's cartoon style (think of Cuphead and Steamboat Willy), the game is lightweight in complexity.

Event Name: The Hollow Cold Facility (A GI JOE RPG story)
Description: Team: you are to deploy to an off‑books Arctic COBRA lab. Intel only shows of a  super‑soldier program; no interior reports. Your orders: infiltrate the lab, recover research drives and lab logs; destroy any remaining samples; neutralize any threats inside. God knows what's waiting for you inside.

Venture into a cavernous megadungeon, Loidheim! Explore a chaotic system of caves that's different every time someone goes in. Take on special exploration roles and seek out The Wandering's secrets. System: D&D 2014 rules at level 4. Pregenerated characters will be available, or make your own.

Werewolf is a social deduction game played in rounds with two phases: day and night. By day, players debate who is guilty; by night, special powers are used and the werewolves secretly choose a victim. Will you survive?

Event Name: Pirate Borg: Buried in the Bahamas
Description:
Ahoy mateys! Welcome to the the Dark Caribbean, a place with great treasures and greater danger. For weeks you've searched for treasure in the Bahamas but now the ship is caught in a hurricane. Plunder if ye dare.

Characters will be rolled at table
All required materials will be provided

Event Name: Dread: A Game of Horror and Hope
Description: Play as regular folks trying to survive in this horror RPG. Instead of rolling dice, you'll need to test your dexterity by pulling Jenga tiles to succeed. If you cause the Jenga tower to fall, your character will meet their unfortunate demise! What horrors await you? Play to find out!

Event Name: The Assassination of the Merchant King - Daggerheart Oneshot
Description: The world of Nimia is on the brink of war. The Merchant King of Ossuaria - King Hydronthadus VI - means to upend the peace between the 8 island kingdoms by conquering port towns across the world. Nimia needs heroes. Nimia needs you. Infiltrate the Merchant King's castle and bring him to justice.

You are the head of a fiefdom and its future is in your hands. Will you develop agriculture with fields and mills? Or will you become a pious church-builder or prefer to feast in your sumptuous palaces? Develop your lands in your image and become the most influential lord in the kingdom.

Werewolf is a social deduction game played in rounds with two phases: day and night. By day, players debate who is guilty; by night, special powers are used and the werewolves secretly choose a victim. Will you survive?

Event Name: Slugblaster - TURBO X (New Player Quickstart One Shot)
Description: You are Teens and you are slugblasters. It's dangerous. It's Stupid. It's got parents in a panic. And it's the coolest thing ever. You'll go on an interdimensional adventure to Be Cool and get In Trouble.

Event Name: Hollows - The Sins of Grisham Priory
Description:
Hollows is a tactical combat RPG about slaying monsters in cursed dimensions known as Hollows. 

The primary focus of this game is a unique combat system inspired by fighting bosses in video games like Dark Souls.

The game is set in a Victorian Horror setting and may allude to sensitive themes.

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.

Event Name: Quacks of Quedlinburg: Learn to Play
Description: In The Quacks of Quedlinburg, players are charlatans — or quack doctors — each making their own secret brew by adding ingredients one at a time. Take care with what you add, though, for a pinch too much of this or that will spoil the whole mixture!

Werewolf is a social deduction game played in rounds with two phases: day and night. By day, players debate who is guilty; by night, special powers are used and the werewolves secretly choose a victim. Will you survive?
Restore found relics to working condition as efficiently as possible

Start your day with a dose of nostalgia and laughter! Join us for a delightful session featuring all your favorite cartoon pals from the past. Relive the magic, humor, and heartwarming moments that made these classics unforgettable. It’s the perfect way to kick off your day with a smile!
Penguins are so pushy, especially when scrambling over slippery ice to get to the ocean! In Push Push Penguin, you will compete in a race filled with slides, snacks, and seals.

Explore a derelict starship, scavenge for supplies, all while trying to understand what caused the vessel to crash. Vast Grimm is a rules-light, sci-fi, splatter-punk RPG oozing with body horror and infectious würms. This adventure will be run by one of the game's creators.

Do you think you have what it takes to take on the treacherous locales of Vald? Will you survive to escape with treasure or glory? Join Sean for a rules-lite, danger-high dungeon delve!

No player pre-game prep needed. Pre-generated characters and supplies will be provided.

The skies are filled with color as the balloons as 8 hot air balloons line up for a thrilling cross country race.  Each player secretly sponsors 3 balloons as you battle others to get your balloons across the finish line first.   1991 - Parker Game - Never released in North America.

Venture into a cavernous megadungeon, Loidheim! A river by a deep cave cult's base was discovered, but no one knows where it came from. Venture upstream and try to chart another way back to the surface. System: D&D 2014 rules at level 5. Pregenerated characters will be available, or make your own.

Event Name: Into the Dark, a Castles and Crusades adventure
Description:
An introductory adventure for Castles and Crusades by Troll Lord Games.
A 1st level adventure using Castles and Crusades rules.
Pregenerated characters and dice will be provided.
Family friendly game.

Play Twilight Imperium 4th Edition and lead your faction to dominance through warfare, politics, and trade. This is an epic, all-day strategy game.
Note: This is a gameplay session only—no rules will be taught. Please attend the intro sessions if you’re new or need a refresher.
Players draw and discard to minimize the total value of their tableau of 12 cards.

Event Name: D&D 5e - Level 5-7 Character Adventure - Frozen in Time
Description: Icewind Dale is frozen. Those who could fled south. Those who couldn't are stranded, surviving by a thread. Others see this as a stroke of luck for them to strike out into the tundra and stake their claim of rumored treasure, theirs for the taking. Will you survive, or succumb to the very cold grip?

A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. A mysterious spire shrouded in purple mist has been seen in the jungles of Ukulam, a continent spanning nature preserve on the planet Castrovel.
A village building, tile laying, cozy game about the founding of Giethoorn, a city known as the Venice of the North.

This one-shot is set in the campaign frame of Five Banners Burning.

Players will all play pre-made characters in their late teens, all at the age of adulthood, who have been invited to a military academy of mysterious and magical origin called, to learn to be leaders of their respective nations.
Manage glass production on your estate in 14th century Black Forest region. Medium weight Euro.

This is great addition to the "span" universe. If you like Wingspan, you might even like this more. And, if you've never tried Wingspan or Finspan, this is great way to get introduced to this line of games.

In Ethnos, players call upon the support of giants, merfolk, halflings, minotaurs, and other fantasy tribes to help them gain control of the land. After three ages of play, whoever has collected the most glory wins!

Netrunner is a two-player asymmetric card game set in a dystopian cyberpunk future. Check out our booth for products, convention exclusive promos, and merch!

NOTE: This event lists a specific start time, but walkups at all vendor hours are encouraged and welcome!

Kaelora is a new game coming from Tangerine Games. Explore a mysterious island, discovering new life and journaling in this puzzley game for 2 to 4 players. This game will be on Kickstarter in March/April 2026.

Event Name: Nahual RPG: A Mexican Urban Fantasy
Description:
You'll shape the story as shape-shifting shamans who scrape together a living hunting Angels and running your Changarro against the odds.

Game Master: Cyrus S.
Setting: Mexico
Rules System: Nahual, PbtA
Number of Players: 3-4
Suitable for Beginners: Yes
Play Style: Emergent Story-driven Gameplay

In a zoo that's ran by the animals themselves, secure your position at the star exhibit for your chance to become the zoo mascot! There will be crafty politicking, clever negotiations, and ruthless schemes in order to garner laurels and votes from your fellow residents.

ENTHRONE is a unique, abstract deduction strategy game for two players. You are the power behind the power. You are the silent hand and one of these unwitting 8 pawns will be your key to securing complete dominion. But your rival hides their own machinations to challenge you.
Classic turn-based strategy game for up to 4 players. Redesign contains 3D settlements, acrylic tiles, player mats, and more.
Daybreak is a cooperative, engine-building, set collection game where everyone is working together to solve climate change. This event is open to beginners, and will include time for teaching.
Get rid of your cards to rise through society from peon to Dalmuti.

The Mistress of Tides has been kidnapped. Her Archfey consort seeks adventurers with a ‘particular set of skills’ to rescue her. Will you answer the call? A 4-Hour Adventurers League Tier 2 adventure. (Please bring a Level 5-10 AL-legal character. A few pre-gens also available.) [Author Run]

Event Name: Rise of Tribes: Learn to Play
Description: In ancient prehistoric times, you have discovered a new land with plentiful lakes, mountains and forests (and apparently many stone rocks that shall be called dice). Your people can develop new things like basketry or find oxen or simply GROW and conquer.

A super-hero experience utilizing the fast-paced "One-Punch System" in a dystopian world where the "heroes" have taken over the worlds governments and normal people (Homo Sapiens) are second-class citizens. Which side are you on? New TTRPG - will be teaching system.

Compete to be the best barista! Place your wager on how many drinks you think you can serve and then work together with the other baristas to try and achieve your goal to gain valuable experience points XP and win.
a fast-paced, push-your-luck card game where players draw numbered cards, aiming to collect seven unique ones without drawing a duplicate number.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.
Full rules explanation followed by guided play. Designed for people who have always wanted to learn Terraforming Mars, but may have found it a little intimidating.

Event Name: Pirate Borg: Trapped in the Tropics
Description: Ahoy, scallywags! Dive into shark-infested seas & brave a jungle swarming with undead fiends & desperate rogues! In this wild Pirate Borg adventure, danger lurks at every turn. Will ye emerge as legends or join the crew of the damned? Adventure be callin’, so ready yer swords & set sail for glory!

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.
Build your aquarium from scratch to see who can maintain the best aquascape and fauna
Two quick and fun-filled games will leave you hungry for more during this Eat. Play. Win! double feature!

Make dresses for a prestigious ball while managing your deck of employees! We will begin with rules teach (45 min). Your spot will be held for 10 min past starting time. After that it is 1st come 1st served, or we start with a lower player count out of respect for others' time.

There’s been a murder, and you and your friends are the most likely suspects. Enter Niles Noir, the professional detective. But when he starts pulling strings that were never meant to be touched, what secrets will come to light?

Come find out in this Knives Out-inspired one-shot.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

Doomlings, LLC and Double Exposure present an official qualifier for the U.S. National Doomlings Championship at Gen Con 2026. Slightly modified tournament rules for standard Doomlings play, no expansions. Two preliminary rounds followed by Elimination rounds. See below for full details
Who can build the best collection of art!

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.

This unique masterpiece of a game combines deep historical knowledge and a deceptively simple card-driven area control mechanic. Become one of the actual delegates to the 1787 Constitutional Convention, trade votes, exercise influence, and compete to be remembered as the Father of the Constitution!

Explore a derelict starship, scavenge for supplies, all while trying to understand what caused the vessel to crash. Vast Grimm is a rules-light, sci-fi, splatter-punk RPG oozing with body horror and infectious würms. This adventure will be run by one of the game's creators.

The experimental deep-sea vessel the _RSV Wallaby_ is performing its first test voyage in the warm waters of the south Pacific. Even this initial voyage is producing new scientific discoveries. But... there are some things that were better left undiscovered...

Do you think you have what it takes to take on the treacherous locales of Vald? Will you survive to escape with treasure or glory? Join Sean for a rules-lite, danger-high dungeon delve!

No player pre-game prep needed. Pre-generated characters and supplies will be provided.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. From their newly founded lodge in the Sloughscar Hills, the Starfinder Society studies the Wreck of the Returned, a massive crashed starship the Starfinders believe was dispatched by the long-lost First Ones.

Event Name: Three Raccoons in a Trenchcoat - A Trash Roleplaying Game
Description: Being a functioning human is hard. PRETENDING to function is mission impossumable. Be it community-oriented possums; messy and disruptive raccoons; dramatic squirrels or easily confused pigeons, you’ll fit right in! Welcome to the Trenchcoat!

In 1993 the world ended not with a bang, but with an exhalation of a Crypt Door. You take on the role of magical practitioners fighting against cryptids and malevolent spirits to reclaim the Dead Spaces of the world. Crowdfunding this February on Kickstarter.

Event Name: Learn to Play KeyForge! (Free deck included)
Description: Tired of the hustle and bustle of having to build decks to play your TCG games? Come learn to play KeyForge, the innovative card game where every deck you play is a completely unique combination of cards! No other player will ever wield the same KeyForge deck as you! Free deck included!

Event Name: Tallow's Deep, a Castles and Crusades adventure
Description:
Only the good die young. The bad prefer it that way. - a goblin proverb.
A 5th level adventure using Castles and Crusades rules by Troll Lord Games.
Pregenerated characters and dice will be provided.
Family friendly game.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.
A Pathfinder Society Scenario designed for 9th- through 12th-level characters. As war hesitates on the horizon, a small squadron of Chelaxian troops have placed themselves over the border of Nidal

DND 5e rules light, where the players play Wizard/Sorcerer hybrids, which not need to prepare spells, and can modify them with meta-magic.  There will be side based initiative, full spell recovery is one hour, 4th level pregen characters provided. It will be combat light, politics heavy.
A cooperative "cozy" board game set in a whimsical valley with unique characters, magical sprites, an engaging story, and an unending adventure
Full rules explanation followed by guided play. Designed for people who have always wanted to learn Terraforming Mars, but may have found it a little intimidating.

Biñho is a popular, fast-paced tabletop dexterity game that simulates soccer, where players use their fingers to flick a small ball across a felt-like surface, trying to score goals past their opponent's player pieces. It combines elements of traditional finger-flicking games with strategy.
Who can build the best collection of art!
Unique asymmetrical turn-based game.  Each faction has different capabilities and win conditions.  Who will control the Wilderness?
Ticket to Ride, the original (North America).
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.

In Ark Nova, you will plan and design a modern, scientifically managed zoo.

No expansions, just the base game.

Adventurers have cut their teeth in Waterdeep's Blue Alley for years. Now comes Green Alley! Heroes: Ready for a next-level challenge that's never the same twice? A 4-Hour Adventurers League Tier 2 adventure. (Please bring a Level 5-10 AL-legal character. A few pre-gens also available.) [Author Run]

The Party Line is a social deduction game where you play as farm animals voting on fictional issues affecting your farm. Your goal is to stay loyal by matching your votes to the Farmer's vote. But beware there are multiple factions with their own unique win conditions.

Blightfall is a dark fantasy TTRPG geared for tragic tales of mutated villagers trading their humanity for the power to defend their home.

Read a playtest review here: https://secretsundaysampler.com/2025/10/16/blightfall-doomed-heroes/

If you're seeking a deeper dive into miniature painting, this session is tailored for you. We'll delve into advanced techniques and offer tips to elevate your creations. Each participant will receive a miniature figure to paint and can test their skills in bringing it to life.
Let’s make cheese in Italy!  This is a follow up to the hit Fromage with an Italy twist.
Sling spells, bust your friends, and battle for moon sapphires in this suited, competitive card game for wizards.

Event Name: Mutant Crawl Classics - The Technomancer of Candy Mountain
Description: The Technomancer of Candy Mountain is a level-3 adventure that takes the PCs high up into the Candy Mountains, a domain where intelligent candy-based lifeforms have inadvertently evolved thanks to the actions of a man named Wuza Wylder.

"The Whimsy Engine" is a roleplaying game of wonder, wit, and weirdness, set in a magical Gilded Age where style is strength, charm is currency, and narrative drives reality. The rules are simple but the plot can be as complicated and in-depth as you desire. New TTRPG - will be teaching system.

Discover this really clever twist on trick-taking! Each card in your hand is a cat in a Schrödinger-type experiment; you know the number from the start, but you determine the color when you play the card (ie, when you “open the box and observe it”). Be careful not to create a paradox!

Game designers! Receive detailed instruction from Andrew J. Smith, host of Proto ATL, on getting the most out of your playtesting sessions. Andrew will give you practical advice that is immediately useful and executable to help you increase the quality of your tests.

Cowabunga! Battle the Foot Clan in this classic TMNT & Other Strangeness session. Play as the Turtles or new mutants in a high-octane 80s adventure through NYC sewers and rooftops. Ninja combat, pizza, and mayhem await! No XP needed. Materials provided (bringing dice would be nice, though)

Play as a majick wielding Punks fighting against the darkness that has come to your town. Are you and your Punks ready to explore the Dead Hills Mall to uncover a nexus of bubbling psionic energy? Or maybe save some unlucky teens who’ve fallen prey to a street gang?

A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. A mysterious transmission emitted by the Wreck of the Returned is causing irritation, pain, and confusion in the anacite citizens of Investigation Site A01.

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.

Event Name: Estate: Raise the Realm - Learn to Play
Description: Learn to play Estate: Raise the Realm with the designers! In Estate: Raise the Realm, players take on the role of noble leaders rebuilding their Estates after the great war, competing to earn the most Victory Points by the fifth Era. Each leader commands unique abilities and an asymmetric tableau.
Sling spells, bust your friends, and battle for moon sapphires in this suited, competitive card game for wizards.
Influence, intrigue, and combat in the universe of Dune. Rise of IX expansion.
Live the legends! This delightful game with open-ended play options offers the ultimate thematic immersion in the Wild West. Beginners welcome!
This game is intended for first-time or novice DC20 players. I will start the session with an overview of the rules, and then we will dive into the adventure.

Event Name: a Quiet Hunger in Harlem (a Hunter: the Vigil Story)
Description: 1935 Harlem: Smalls Paradise thrums with jazz as performers, staff, and patrons revel—until something older and colder tugs at the neighborhood. Whispered bargains, sudden silences, and creeping predation escalate into violence; You, my good hunters, must flee, bargain, or fight to survive.

We’re excited to host a VNTYPL8S from 25th Century Games — and you’ll get to play it before it’s released! VNTYPL8S is a fast, funny party game all about clever vanity license plates. You’ll dream up your own plate, show it off, and then watch everyone try to guess who it belongs to.
Embark on a journey of exploration and discovery along the historic John Muir Trail

The supply boat from Dynnegall is overdue by almost a tenday. Adventurers venture to the small outpost, only to discover a terrible affliction plaguing the people. Time is running short to save them.  A 4-hr Adventurers League adventure for Tier 1 (lvl 1-4).

The perfect distillation of the genre into a bite size package! CBR+PNK is a Forged in the Dark Cyberpunk RPG optimized for electric one-shots and short campaigns. We will be running the PRDTR campaign that comes with the "Augmented" edition of the game.

Event Name: Trouble at the Quorum of Voices - a Daggerheart Oneshot
Description: The Quorum of Voices: an intergovernmental organization where representatives from each of the 8 island nations gather to debate the state of the world. You - along with your fellow security team - receive threats of a magic bomb that's armed to kill everyone present and must find a way to disarm it

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.

Event Name: Slugblaster - TURBO X (New Player Quickstart One Shot)
Description: You are Teens and you are slugblasters. It's dangerous. It's Stupid. It's got parents in a panic. And it's the coolest thing ever. You'll go on an interdimensional adventure to Be Cool and get In Trouble.

Get ready to laugh as a showcase of stand-up comedians tell jokes and provide "humor for the unconventional." This 90-minute event is hosted by Mistarii Comedy Group and is restricted to mature audiences only.

Event Name: Dread: A Game of Horror and Hope
Description: Play as regular folks trying to survive in this horror RPG. Instead of rolling dice, you'll need to test your dexterity by pulling Jenga tiles to succeed. If you cause the Jenga tower to fall, your character will meet their unfortunate demise! What horrors await you? Play to find out!

Event Name: Daggerheart: An Age of Umbra 1st level oneshot
Description:
The Age of Umbra is a dark and broken age where small villages cling to light admidst a looming darkness. Your village elders speak of a way to reignite your village's dying flame, but will you succumb to the perils in the dark?

Expect vibes of Dark Souls, Elden Ring, or darkstrange fantasy.

A Starfinder Society Scenario designed for 1st- through 2nd-level characters. Agents of the mysterious Functionary, self-proclaimed representative of the Wreck of the Returned, slink through the Sloughscar Hills on the planet Akiton, abducting anyone who refuses to bow to her commands.

Event Name: Hollows - The Sins of Grisham Priory
Description:
Hollows is a tactical combat RPG about slaying monsters in cursed dimensions known as Hollows. 

The primary focus of this game is a unique combat system inspired by fighting bosses in video games like Dark Souls.

The game is set in a Victorian Horror setting and may allude to sensitive themes.

Blood on the Clocktower	Blood on the Clocktower is a social deduction game of secrets, lies, and logic. Players take on hidden roles as Good or Evil, using unique abilities, discussion, and deception to identify the Demon before time runs out—or ensure it survives.
Explore an entire planet's open world from first-person perspectives
Cooperative deduction game. Work together to diffuse the bomb but watch out for that bomb!!

Event Name: Feast of Legends: The Queen's Quest (Wendy's RPG oneshot)
Description: Come play the Wendy's RPG and join Queen Wendy, first of her name, breaker of fast food chains, defender of all things fresh, never frozen, and defends the realm from the treacherous evils of those who practice the dark art of frozen beef.

Try the new "tactical, heroic, cinematic fantasy RPG" in this convention adventure from MCDM. Bring a miniature - this will very much be played on a battle map, folks!
Recommend for experienced tabletop roleplaying players, but I'm more than happy to teach.

Level 1
Pregens provided
No homemade pcs

Event Name: Dungeon Crawl Classics - Christopher Robin's Nightmare
Description: Christopher Robin's Nightmare is a point-crawl adventure that takes place in the dreams of Christopher Robin. The PCs arrive in the Hundred Acre Wood where they need to save the beloved characters we all know from the classic stories.

Discover this really clever twist on trick-taking! Each card in your hand is a cat in a Schrödinger-type experiment; you know the number from the start, but you determine the color when you play the card (ie, when you “open the box and observe it”). Be careful not to create a paradox!

Mrs. Applebottom's tressym (a cat with wings) didn't come home last night and she is terrified for her safety.  Fluffy has been bringing back "trinkets" from the cemetery for several days now, but always came home before dark.  Can you find Fluffy and bring her back home?

Event Name: A Debt Due for a Rougarou (A Daggerheart story)
Description: When a blood debt comes due, the Rougarou stalks the misty bayou. A terrible curse has ravaged Sweet Moss for years. Unravel who bargained, what was promised, and who must pay—before legacy, guilt, and sacrifice drown the local village in shadow. Will you break the curse, or become its next tale.
Build up your airline and sell routes to Pan-Am

Compete to be the best barista! Place your wager on how many drinks you think you can serve and then work together with the other baristas to try and achieve your goal to gain valuable experience points XP and win.
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.

Fight to survive against the odds in this introductory Alien RPG one-shot, and see if you can escape the Hadley's Hope colony alive!

Game Master: Cyrus S.
Setting: Sci-Fi Space Colony
Rules System: Alien 2E, Year Zero
Number of Players: 3-5
Suitable for Beginners: Yes
Themes: Horror, Survival

Event Name: Estate: Raise the Realm - Learn to Play
Description: Learn to play Estate: Raise the Realm with the designers! In Estate: Raise the Realm, players take on the role of noble leaders rebuilding their Estates after the great war, competing to earn the most Victory Points by the fifth Era. Each leader commands unique abilities and an asymmetric tableau.

Event Name: Gay, They, & Gal Paladins (Thirsty Sword Lesbians)
Description: A one-shot for Thirsty Sword Lesbians! Playbooks provided for pre-gens with room to customize. First hour will map relationships and strings, followed by a 3-hour late night romp inspired by equal parts She-Ra, Kipo, Steven Universe, and Owl House.

Netrunner is a two-player asymmetric card game set in a dystopian cyberpunk future. Check out our booth for products, convention exclusive promos, and merch!

NOTE: This event lists a specific start time, but walkups at all vendor hours are encouraged and welcome!

Embark on a journey with us at our enchanting tabletop flea market, where well-loved board games discover a splendid new haven. Immerse yourself in the joy of finding treasures and, in the process, indulge in delightful savings that will leave you smiling all the way home. This is ATTENDEE TICKETS.

Event Name: Pirate Borg: The Cavern of Cursed Tears
Description:
An old sailor, told a tale that caught your attention. Back in his pirate days, a treasure eluded him, the cavern of cursed tears. Spelunk through caverns, mudslides, and spectral sanctums in your search for lost artifacts.

Characters will be rolled at table
All required materials will be provided

Event Name: Snap Ships Tactics: Learn to Play
Description: Learn to play Snap Ships Tactics, a miniature spacecraft battle game!  This game is easy to learn and quick to play - Can be played 1v1, 2v2, and vs automated opponents.  Several Pre-built ships will be provided as well as parts to customize.  Time should allow for learning and 1-3 games if desired.
In Knarr, you are the leader of a band of Vikings that you send to new destinations. Manage the recruitment of your crew, and choose the best territories to explore.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.
Game of strategy, intuition, and luck. The original game, no expansions.

Event Name: Learn to Play KeyForge! (Free deck included)
Description: Tired of the hustle and bustle of having to build decks to play your TCG games? Come learn to play KeyForge, the innovative card game where every deck you play is a completely unique combination of cards! No other player will ever wield the same KeyForge deck as you! Free deck included!
Faraway is a card game that uses a combination of drafting and set collection. It seems simple on the surface, but can be delightfully challenging. Always a hit!

You are part of a small community built up in the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse (think The Walking Dead). Go out on a looting run, then pick how the loot is used!
Experience with Genesys not required- it's relatively easy to learn game. Pregenerated characters will be available, or make your own.
As a galactic gardener, grow & harvest during the two stellar phases of splendor

A super-hero event of self-discovery and super heroics in the throes of a planetary invasion from space, other realities, alternate dimensions, and hidden empires. New TTRPG - will be teaching system.
A gripping, crises resource management technology game/sim on the space race.  Now on preview on Kickstarter.

Event Name: Mothership - A COG in the Machine
Description:
A group of new indentures assigned to the COG are fresh out of training and on the COG Cruiser "Constant Sorrow." They have been awakened from hypersleep to investigate the Ice Miner "van Rijn," which is broadcasting a distress signal.

What will they find? And, can they survive their first mission?

The new moon is a symbol for a new beginning, the perfect time to start something new and to plan your future — and that is what Nova Luna (lat. for new moon) is all about. In each round of this abstract tile-laying game, you have to plan your future anew, developing a new strategy to cope with what

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

Event Name: Lean to Play Puerto Rico 1897: Specal Edition
Description: Manage a local farm, construct buildings and trade goods in Puerto Rico
A village building, tile laying, cozy game about the founding of Giethoorn, a city known as the Venice of the North.

Blightfall is a dark fantasy TTRPG geared for tragic tales of mutated villagers trading their humanity for the power to defend their home.

Read a playtest review here: https://secretsundaysampler.com/2025/10/16/blightfall-doomed-heroes/

Get ready for fast thinking, friendly competition, and a whole lot of laughs! Tapple is the high-energy word game where every second counts. Race against the timer to name items in a category, hit the letter, and pass the turn before time runs out. Sounds easy… until the pressure’s on!

Event Name: D&D 5e24: The Eye In the Mist
Description: The events at Dynnegall revealed evidence that a new threat to fey and Ffolk may have emerged on Moray. The ties to prophecy are too strong to ignore. Attention turns to the Eye in the Mist, a moonwell in the forest of Moray’s eastern coast. A 4-hr Adventurers League adventure for Tier 1 (lvl 1-4).
Hidden strength area control.

a DnD dungeon crawl but with a twist of the lost monument of Loki. You are sent on a quest to find what is becoming this of this lost place one many fear. For even the gods cant be sure what is truth and what is trick.

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

Galactic Cruise is a thinky (but not burnout your brain), worker placement game where players are competing to build and launch cruise ships into space. This event is open to beginners, and will include time for teaching.
In Sanctuary, you will plan and design a modern, scientifically-managed zoo for animals and visitors.
Shape patterns and masterpieces, and etch your name in Art Nouveau
Manage glass production on your estate in 14th century Black Forest region. Medium weight Euro.

Event Name: Slugblaster - Welcome to the Freaking Multiverse!
Description: A portal into the radical world of Slugblaster! A perfect intro into the hit game sweeping the nation! Play a cool crew of hoverboard skaters on inter-dimensional adventures and hopefully make it home before you get grounded!

Event Name: DC20 Tutorial: A Cold Kind of Love
Description: This game is intended for first-time or novice DC20 players. I will start the session with an overview of the rules, and then we will dive into the adventure.
Faraway is a card game that uses a combination of drafting and set collection. It seems simple on the surface, but can be delightfully challenging. Always a hit!

Event Name: Night of the Yule Cat D&D 5e14
Description: Face off against Yulanmonder, a huge cat that emerged from the forest. While sheltered from the blizzard, you're safe, but when in the open, you're vulnerable to the full wrath of the Yule Cat. But is the cat the only danger to emerge from the storm? For 5th level players, pregen characters provided

Koopia is a handcrafted wooden dexterity game designed for quick play and lasting fun. Players flick discs into scoring pits using skill and control, making every round exciting and accessible for all ages and skill levels.

Are you new to the world of miniature painting, or are you an expert with a brush? Each attendee will receive a single figure to paint and can try their hand at bringing it to life. Kids under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

Play as a majick wielding Punks fighting against the darkness that has come to your town. Are you and your Punks ready to explore the Dead Hills Mall to uncover a nexus of bubbling psionic energy? Or maybe save some unlucky teens who’ve fallen prey to a street gang?

Event Name: Shadowdark - The Waking of Willowby Hall
Description:
An abandoned manor house is rumored to contain unimaginable riches and relics ripe for the taking, but plundering the household may prove challenging in the face of a rival party, an angry giant, and a loud, honking goose.

Beginner friendly! All supplies/characters provided.
Assemble villagers to help recover the glory of Buttonville

Event Name: Fate of The Fellowship Cooperative Adventure
Description: Learn and Play the new Pandemic system game Fate of The Fellowship! Guide the companions of the ring in this tense and thematic adventure!

Event Name: Feast of Legends: The Queen's Quest (Wendy's RPG oneshot)
Description: Come play the Wendy's RPG and join Queen Wendy, first of her name, breaker of fast food chains, defender of all things fresh, never frozen, and defends the realm from the treacherous evils of those who practice the dark art of frozen beef.
Collect seashells that come and go with the tide on the beaches of Sanibel
Let’s make cheese in Italy!  This is a follow up to the hit Fromage with an Italy twist.
